summary.span: 允许你使用其他源的数据有效地批量加载 SQL Server 表。

span.span: Lets you efficiently bulk load a SQL Server table with data from another source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft SQL Server 包含名为常用命令提示实用工具**bcp**将数据从一个表移到另一个，无论是在上一台服务器或服务器之间。Microsoft SQL Server includes a popular command-prompt utility named **bcp** for moving data from one table to another, whether on a single server or between servers. 类，可以编写提供类似的功能的托管的代码解决方案。The class lets you write managed code solutions that provide similar functionality. 还有其他方式将数据载入 SQL Server 表 （INSERT 语句，例如），但这些显著的性能优势。There are other ways to load data into a SQL Server table (INSERT statements, for example), but offers a significant performance advantage over them. 类只能用于向 SQL Server 表中写入数据。The class can be used to write data only to SQL Server tables. 但是，数据源并不局限于 SQL Server;可以使用任何数据源，只要数据可以加载到实例，或浏览器进行实例。However, the data source is not limited to SQL Server; any data source can be used, as long as the data can be loaded to a instance or read with a instance. 将失败时大容量加载类型的列SQL Server 2008 中的类型是一种日期/时间类型列添加到 SQL Server。 will fail when bulk loading a column of type into a SQL Server column whose type is one of the date/time types added in SQL Server 2008. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何使用 类加载数据。The following console application demonstrates how to load data using the class. 在此示例中，用于将数据从复制**Production.Product**表中的 SQL Server **AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的类似表的数据库。In this example, a is used to copy data from the **Production.Product** table in the SQL Server **AdventureWorks** database to a similar table in the same database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为连接已打开初始化实例，连接会保持打开后实例是否闭合。Because the connection is already open when the instance is initialized, the connection remains open after the instance is closed. 如果`connection`自变量为 null，引发。If the `connection` argument is null, an is thrown. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何大容量加载数据使用已打开的连接。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data using a connection that is already open. 在此示例中，用于将数据从复制**Production.Product**表中的 SQL Server **AdventureWorks**到同一个数据库中的类似表的数据库。In this example, a is used to copy data from the **Production.Product** table in the SQL Server **AdventureWorks** database to a similar table in the same database. 此示例只为了方便本文演示。This example is for demonstration purposes only. 您不会使用`SqlBulkCopy`将数据从一个表移到另一个在生产应用程序位于同一数据库中。You would not use `SqlBulkCopy` to move data from one table to another in the same database in a production application. 请注意，源数据不需要位于 SQL Server;你可以使用可以读取到任何数据源或加载到。Note that the source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. console application demonstrates how to perform a bulk load by using a connection specified as a string. 设置一个选项以加载目标表，然后使用中的源表的标识列的值。An option is set to use the value in the identity column of the source table when you load the destination table. 在此示例中，源数据第一次读取从 SQL Server 表实例。In this example, the source data is first read from a SQL Server table to a instance. 源表和目标表中每个包含 Identity 列。The source table and destination table each include an Identity column. 默认情况下，新的值**标识**添加每个行的目标表中生成列。By default, a new value for the **Identity** column is generated in the destination table for each row added. 强制批量加载进程，用于打开连接时，设置选项在此示例中，**标识**改为源表中的值。In this example, an option is set when the connection is opened that forces the bulk load process to use the **Identity** values from the source table instead. 若要查看此选项如何改变大容量加载的工作方式，使用运行此示例**dbo。BulkCopyDemoMatchingColumns**表为空。To see how the option changes the way the bulk load works, run the sample with the **dbo.BulkCopyDemoMatchingColumns** table empty. 从源中加载的所有行。All rows load from the source. 然后再次运行示例而不清空表。Then run the sample again without emptying the table. 引发异常，代码将消息写入控制台通知您由于主键约束冲突尚未添加行。An exception is thrown and the code writes a message to the console notifying you that rows weren't added because of primary key constraint violations. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果选项包括`UseInternalTransaction`和`externalTransaction`自变量不为 null， **InvalidArgumentException**引发。If options include `UseInternalTransaction` and the `externalTransaction` argument is not null, an **InvalidArgumentException** is thrown. 有关示例演示如何使用`SqlBulkCopy`在事务中，请参阅[事务和批量复制操作](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md)。For examples demonstrating how to use `SqlBulkCopy` in a transaction, see [Transaction and Bulk Copy Operations](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BatchSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.BatchSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 每个批处理中的行数。

span.span: Number of rows in each batch.

summary.span: 在每个批处理结束时，批处理中的行将发送到服务器。

span.span: At the end of each batch, the rows in the batch are sent to the server.

value.span: 属性的整数值；或者如果未设置任何值，则为零。

span.span: The integer value of the property, or zero if no value has been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当一批已完成处理完行或有更多的行发送到目标数据源。A batch is complete when rows have been processed or there are no more rows to send to the destination data source. 零 （默认值） 指示每个操作是单个批处理。Zero (the default) indicates that each operation is a single batch. 如果实例已声明但选项在起作用，将行发送到服务器执行时间，但没有与事务相关的操作的行。If the instance has been declared without the option in effect, rows are sent to the server rows at a time, but no transaction-related action is taken. 如果实际上，是作为单独的事务插入的行的每个批处理。If is in effect, each batch of rows is inserted as a separate transaction. 可以在任何时候设置属性。The property can be set at any time. 如果大容量复制已在进行中，当前批的大小根据上一批大小。If a bulk copy is already in progress, the current batch is sized according to the previous batch size. 后续的批次使用的新大小。Subsequent batches use the new size. 如果最初为零和更改时操作正在进行，操作将作为单个批处理数据加载。If the is initially zero and changed while a operation is already in progress, that operation loads the data as a single batch. 任何后续对相同操作实例使用新。Any subsequent operations on the same instance use the new . ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何大容量加载数据批 50 行中。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data in batches of 50 rows. 示例说明如何适用于事务，请参阅[事务和批量复制操作](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md)。For an example illustrating how works with a transaction, see [Transaction and Bulk Copy Operations](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/transaction-and-bulk-copy-operations.md). 在此示例中，源数据第一次读取从 SQL Server 表实例。In this example, the source data is first read from a SQL Server table to a instance. 源数据不需要位于 SQL Server;你可以使用可以读取到任何数据源或加载到。The source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. summary.span: 超时之前可用于完成操作的秒数。

span.span: Number of seconds for the operation to complete before it times out.
The integer value of the property.
The default is 30 seconds.

value.span: 值为 0 表示无限制，大容量复制将无限期等待。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates no limit; the bulk copy will wait indefinitely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该操作不超时，也不会提交事务，并从目标表中删除所有复制的行。If the operation does time out, the transaction is not committed and all copied rows are removed from the destination table. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何修改为 60 秒超时批量加载数据时。The following console application demonstrates how to modify the time-out to 60 seconds when bulk loading data. 在此示例中，源数据第一次读取从 SQL Server 表实例。In this example, the source data is first read from a SQL Server table to a instance. 源数据不需要位于 SQL Server;你可以使用可以读取到任何数据源或加载到。The source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]`INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.Timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.Timeout/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.Timeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.Timeout/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用后上对象，没有其他操作将会成功。After you call a on the object, no other operation will succeed. 调用方法会引发。Calls to the method will throw an . 调用方法从事件导致引发。Calling the method from the event causes an to be thrown. 注意，打开实例均已关闭隐式的末尾`using`块。Note that open instances are closed implicitly at the end of a `using` block. ## Examples 下面的示例使用相同实例将销售订单和其关联的详细信息添加到两个目标表。The following example uses the same instance to add sales orders and their associated details to two destination tables. 因为**AdventureWorks**销售订单表很大、 示例读取仅订单的某一特定帐号和大容量将这些订单和详细信息复制到目标表。Because the **AdventureWorks** sales order tables are large, the sample reads only orders placed by a certain account number and bulk copies those orders and details to the destination tables. 在这两个大容量复制操作都完成后才使用方法。The method is used only after both bulk copy operations are complete. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. summary.span: 列映射定义数据源中的列和目标中的列之间的关系。

span.span: Column mappings define the relationships between columns in the data source and columns in the destination.
A collection of column mappings.
By default, it is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当数据源和目标表具有相同数目的列，且每个数据源中的源列的序号位置匹配相应的目标列的序号位置是不必要的集合。If the data source and the destination table have the same number of columns, and the ordinal position of each source column within the data source matches the ordinal position of the corresponding destination column, the collection is unnecessary. 但是，如果列计数不同，或者不一致的序号位置，则必须使用以确保将数据复制到正确的列。However, if the column counts differ, or the ordinal positions are not consistent, you must use to make sure that data is copied into the correct columns. 在大容量复制操作的执行期间可以访问此集合，但不能更改。During the execution of a bulk copy operation, this collection can be accessed, but it cannot be changed. 任何尝试将其更改都将引发。Any attempt to change it will throw an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未设置时调用时，引发。If has not been set when is called, an is thrown. 如果修改时操作正在运行，更改不会影响当前操作。If is modified while a operation is running, the change does not affect the current operation. 新下一步时，将使用值调用方法。The new value is used the next time a method is called. 是由三部分名称 (`..`)。 is a three-part name (`..`). 如果你选择，可以限定及其数据库和所属架构的表名称。You can qualify the table name with its database and owning schema if you choose. 但是，如果表名使用下划线 (_) 或任何其他特殊字符，则必须转义使用括号中的名称 (`[..]`)。However, if the table name uses an underscore ("_") or any other special characters, you must escape the name using surrounding brackets as in (`[..]`). 有关详细信息，请参阅 SQL Server 联机丛书中的"标识符"。For more information, see "Identifiers" in SQL Server Books Online. 你可以将数据大容量复制到临时表使用一个值，类似于`tempdb..#table`或`tempdb..#table`为属性。You can bulk-copy data to a temporary table by using a value such as `tempdb..#table` or `tempdb..#table` for the property. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何大容量加载数据使用已打开的连接。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data using a connection that is already open. 目标表是中的表**AdventureWorks**数据库。The destination table is a table in the **AdventureWorks** database. 在此示例中，使用的连接是首先从 SQL Server 表中读取数据实例。In this example, the connection is first used to read data from a SQL Server table to a instance. 源数据不需要位于 SQL Server;你可以使用可以读取到任何数据源或加载到。The source data does not have to be located on SQL Server; you can use any data source that can be read to an or loaded to a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 复制操作开始读取器中的下一步可用行。The copy operation starts at the next available row in the reader. 大多数情况下，仅返回了读取器或类似的调用，因此下一可用行是第一行。Most of the time, the reader was just returned by or a similar call, so the next available row is the first row. 若要处理多个结果，调用上的数据读取器和调用试。To process multiple results, call on the data reader and call again. 请注意，使用修改读取器的状态。Note that using modifies the state of the reader. 该方法将调用直至指定，返回 false，中止该操作时，或发生错误。The method will call until it returns false, the operation is aborted, or an error occurs. 这意味着数据读取器将在不同的状态下，可能在该结果集末尾时操作已完成。This means that the data reader will be in a different state, probably at the end of the result set, when the operation is complete. 大容量复制操作正在进行，关联的目标时忙为它提供服务，并可以对连接执行任何其他操作。While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection. 集合从数据读取器列映射到目标数据库表。The collection maps from the data reader columns to the destination database table. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何从大容量加载数据。The following console application demonstrates how to bulk load data from a . 目标表是中的表**AdventureWorks**数据库。The destination table is a table in the **AdventureWorks** database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅行中所示的状态`rowState`自变量，并且不删除复制到目标表。Only rows in the that are in the states indicated in the `rowState` argument and have not been deleted are copied to the destination table. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定，则任何， ，和行也将被复制到服务器。If is specified, any , , and rows will also be copied to the server. 将不引发任何异常。No exception will be raised. 大容量复制操作正在进行，关联的目标时忙为它提供服务，并可以对连接执行任何其他操作。While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection. 集合将映射从到目标数据库表的列。The collection maps from the columns to the destination database table. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序演示如何大容量加载中的行的匹配指定的状态。The following Console application demonstrates how to bulk load only the rows in a that match a specified state. 在这种情况下，添加仅未更改的行。In this case, only unchanged rows are added. 目标表是中的表**AdventureWorks**数据库。The destination table is a table in the **AdventureWorks** database. 在此示例中，创建在运行的时和三个行添加到它。In this example, a is created at run time and three rows are added to it. 之前执行方法，某一行的编辑。Before the method is executed, one of the rows is edited. 方法调用与`DataRowState.Unchanged``rowState`自变量，因此，只有两个未更改的行是大容量复制到目标。The method is called with a `DataRowState.Unchanged` `rowState` argument, so only the two unchanged rows are bulk copied to the destination. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非你已创建了工作表中所述，将不会运行此示例[批量复制示例设置](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md)。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup.md). 提供此代码是为了演示使用的语法**SqlBulkCopy**仅。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源和目标表都在相同的 SQL Server 实例，它将更加容易和快速使用 Transact SQL`INSERT … SELECT`语句复制数据。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.DataRowState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.DataRowState/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.DataRowState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.DataRowState/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 的异步版本，将数据源中的所有行都复制到目标表中。该目标表由 对象的 指定。

span.span: An asynchronous version of , which copies all rows from a data source to a destination table specified by the property of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果多个活动结果集 (MARS) 将禁用，建立连接忙。If multiple active result sets (MARS) is disabled, makes the connection busy. 如果启用了 MARS，你可以交错调用与相同的连接中的其他命令。If MARS is enabled, you can interleave calls to with other commands in the same connection. 当一项操作失败时回滚的行数取决于几件事情：The number of rows that are rolled back when one fails depends on several things: - 如果指定。If is specified. - 如果你有自己的事务。If you have your own transaction. - 的值。The value of . 在将数据发送到服务器，当前批次时没有错误时 (所指定的) 将被回滚。When there is an error while sending data to the server, the current batch (as specified by ) will be rolled back. 如果未指定并且你有自己的事务，整个事务将回滚 （其中包括所有以前批次也）。If is not specified and you have your own transaction, the entire transaction will be rolled back (which includes all previous batches as well). 使用须知多少行被复制到服务器。Use to know how many rows were copied to the server.
